descriptionParagraphs: We are all connected; To each other, biologically. To the earth, chemically. To the rest of the universe atomically.

What was most significant about the lunar voyage was not that man set foot on the Moon but that they set eye on the earth. Many say exploration is part of our destiny, but itâ€™s actually our duty to future generations and their quest to ensure the survival of the human species.
